# Pull Request

## Title Format
<!-- Use Conventional Commits format: <type>[optional scope]: <description> -->
<!-- Examples:
  - feat(api): add CRUD endpoints for App entity
  - fix(source): correct version date serialization
  - docs: update installation steps in README
  - refactor(ui)!: migrate to new component library
-->

## Description
<!-- Provide a clear and concise description of the changes -->

## Type of Change
<!-- Mark the relevant option with an 'x' -->
- [ ] `feat`: New feature
- [ ] `fix`: Bug fix
- [ ] `docs`: Documentation only
- [ ] `style`: Code style/formatting
- [ ] `refactor`: Code refactoring
- [ ] `perf`: Performance improvement
- [ ] `test`: Adding or updating tests
- [ ] `build`: Build system or dependencies
- [ ] `ci`: CI configuration
- [ ] `chore`: Other changes

## Breaking Changes
<!-- If this introduces breaking changes, explain what breaks and migration path -->
- [ ] This PR includes breaking changes

## Related Issues
<!-- Link related issues using #issue_number -->
Closes #

## Testing
<!-- Describe the testing done to verify the changes -->
- [ ] Tested locally
- [ ] Added/updated tests
- [ ] All tests pass

## Checklist
- [ ] Code follows project conventions
- [ ] Documentation updated (README, copilot-instructions, etc.)
- [ ] No real IPA files committed (placeholders only)
- [ ] Schema validation added/updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Commit messages follow Conventional Commits format
